newsitem.title: USA: Zonagen files to offer 2 million shares.
newsitem.headline: Zonagen files to offer 2 million shares.

text.p: Zonagen Inc filed Wednesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission a registration to sell up to two million common shares.
After the offering, outstanding common will total 9,627,801 common, the filing said.

The company granted the underwriters a 30-day overallotment option to purchase up to 300,000 additional common shares. The offering will be made through Volpe Brown Whelan & Company and Raymond James & Associates Inc.

Net proceeds will be used to fund continued clinical development of and regulatory submissions relating to Vasomex, continued research and development of other potential products, the exercise of an option to buy out the rights of a third party to royalities on sales of Vasmex, capital expenditures and for general corporate purposes.

Zonagen, based in the Woodlands, Texas, is a biopharmaceutical company engaged in the research, development and marketing of products which address conditions and diseases associated with the human reproductive system.
